string-array.name: Faith_Is_The_Substance
string-array.item: 1) When Jesus died, He saved everybody.
2) No matter how much that you pray, you\'ll never be forgiven until you _____ you\'re forgiven, then you _____ that you are, then _____ like you are.
3) "Satan can copy any kind of a gift, any kind of a manifestation, but he can\'t _____."
4) Where did Brother Branham read just a little Scripture before he expressed his thought?
5) Now, faith is the _______ of things hoped for; the _______ of things not seen.
6) Seeing is believing.
7) Who did Brother Branham use to make an example of seeing and believing?
8) Man was given five senses to contact God.
9) Jesus questioned, "Will I find _____ when I come back?"
10) About _______ percent of the people that come to the platform has hope instead of faith.
11) The serpent spoke of _____, and brass spoke of_____.
12) A portion of the Deity of God dwells in the heart of every borned again Christian.
13) What did Christ do unto the eleven with their unbelief and their hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen Him after He was risen?
14) And I\'d rather any man would _____ me a sermon than _____ me one.
15) Which one is NOT an example used by Brother Branham when he spoke of God using remedies?
16) What did Brother Branham say was the sole purpose for his ministry?
17) During the prayer line, what did Brother Branham say to do if you can\'t get enough faith up for your healing?
18) Why does Brother Branham call his son, Billy, by the name of Paul?
19) Brother Branham was going to try to pray for _______.
20) Who did Brother Branham call upon first before praying for the sick?

string-array.name: The_Manifestation_Of_The_Spirit
string-array.item: 1) Where did Brother Branham take his text from in this message?
2) In the story told by Brother Baxter, what did the slave say he wanted before he was to be killed.
3) Where did Brother Branham mention he was going after the meetings?
4) What two classes of people does Brother Branham compare in this message?
5) What was Brother Branham\'s mother\'s maiden name?
6) For every counterfeit there has to be _________ somewhere.
7) What did the fortuneteller say about Paul and Silas?
8) What criminal did Brother Branham speak of in this message?
9) God never takes His Spirit from the earth.
10) What was it that appeared to Peter when they were having a prayer meeting at John Mark\'s house?
11) How many prayer cards were given out for the prayer line in this message?
12) Where did Brother Branham say the first sister in the prayer line had seen him before?
13) What did Elijah ask God to do for Gehazi when they were in Dothan and outnumbered by the Philistines?
14) Where was one of the greatest meetings that the Hebrew children ever had?
15) What did Brother Branham say we could not govern?
16) How did Brother Branham describe the weather?
17) If you realize that you\'re a son and daughter of God, and the deposit\'s made in Calvary, what did Brother Branham say that you have in your hand?
18) Brother Branham looked forward to this time in Toledo since he was in _______ last year?
19) How many people did Brother Branham say may have been at the pool of Bethesda?
20) When where you saved?

string-array.name: Life_Of_Demons_And_Visions
string-array.item: 1) What animal did Brother Branham hear as he was walking down through a wilderness country in a vision?
2) Where was Brother Branham during this vision?
3) Who knew where Milltown was?
4) Where did Brother Branham feel the Spirit of God tell him to \"Stop\" when he got to Milltown?
5) What did Brother Branham have to do in order to hold a revival at the church in Milltown?
6) How many people were in the congregation the first night of the revival?
7) How long had Miss Georgie Carter been laying in her bed with TB?
8) What did Georgie Carter ask Brother Branham?
9) Where was Brother Branham baptizing when it seemed like Angels were setting on every branch of the tree?

10) There was a certain minister who didn\'t believe in immersing, but during the baptism service, what happened that caused his entire congregation to walk out into the river, screaming with their good clothes on, to be baptized by Brother Branham?
11) Why didn\'t Brother Branham eat supper at Brother Wright\'s house after he baptized all the people?
12) When you try and pray, and the briers stick you, and the floor is too hard, that\'s the time to ______.
13) What did Brother Branham see in the woods when he was about to go for supper?
14) What did the deep Voice say to Brother Branham?
15) As long as you\'re doing right, you can\'t be doing wrong.
16) What did little Georgie promise God she would do if He healed her that afternoon?
17) When Georgie Carter\'s mother saw a vision, who appeared to her and said \"Who\'s this?\"
18) How much did Georgie weigh when she jumped to her feet perfectly normal and well?
19) What song did Georgie play on the piano after she was healed?
20) Brother Branham wasn\'t just trying to talk loud to the people during the prayer line, but he said sometimes them demons gets disobedient, and then you\'ve got to do what?

string-array.name: Life_Story
string-array.item: 1) Where was Home instituted?
2) Where does Brother Branham read from out of the Scriptures?
3) Brother Branham’s grandfather on his mother’s side was a _______.
4) What was Humpy’s real name?
5) Brother Branham wanted his friend’s Boy Scout suite when he was done with it. What was his friend\'s name and how much of the suite did Brother Branham end up with?
6) When Brother Branham and his soon to be wife would going riding together, what time of night did they have to be in?
7) Where did Brother Branham get married?
8) Who said, "After all, life doesn\'t consist of how much the world\'s goods you own, but how contented you are with the portion that\'s \'lotted to you?"
9) What was the name of the brother that laid his hand on Brother Branham after speaking in an unknown tongue?
10) Where was Brother Branham the first time he was acquainted with the denominational Pentecostal people?
11) When Brother Branham got up and spoke at the Pentecostal meeting he got his text from _______.
12) How many months were there between Billy Paul being born and Sharon Rose?
13) What was Brother Branham doing that caused his boat to be swept out into the Ohio River?
14) What happened to Brother Branham while trying to go to Charlestown to look for his wife?
15) Where was his wife when he finally found her?
16) What two things did Sister Hope want Brother Branham to promise her before she passed away?
17) Sister Hope wanted Rayon stockings.
18) Who did Brother Branham see in the dream he had of being out west?
19) When Brother Branham saw his wife Hope in Heaven, he told her he had been praying for the sick.
20) What did Sister Hope do for Brother Branham when his chair got taken away?

string-array.name: The_Resurrection_Of_Lazarus
string-array.item: 1) There\'s no Scripture in the Bible that says Christians die.
2) One case of healing or one vision before him, took more out of Brother Branham than _____ hours of preaching.
3) How many professional fights did Brother Branham win?
4) Where did Brother Branham\'s parents meet?
5) What happened to the man that tried to deceive God and put false things on his prayer card?
6) Where does Brother Branham read in the Scriptures?
7) Who went out to meet Jesus when He was returning from Jerusalem after the death of Lazarus?
8) The Logos is the Son of God.
9) When God said "Let Us make man in Our own image," what image did He make?
10) What did Brother Branham describe man as? It became marred and black when man sinned and fell?
11) _____ announced the first coming of Christ, and _____ will announce the second coming of Christ.
12) What happened to Zacharias because he failed to believe God\'s Angel?
13) Zacharias had many examples, but he still failed to believe the Angel. What were two examples Brother Branham used?
14) How was Jesus related to John?
15) What happened the first time the Name of Jesus Christ was ever spoke by mortal lips?
16) When John said "Behold, the Lamb of God that takes away the sin of the world," as Jesus was walking down to the Jordan, what color of robe was He wearing?
17) What do theologians believe Lazarus died with?
18) Brother Branham said Lazarus was the breadwinner for his family. What did Lazarus do?
19) What was Martha\'s answer when Jesus said "Believeth thou this?"
20) Which of the following examples is NOT one that Brother Branham used when speaking about Jesus being more than a man?
